text: Léon Epin was an archer from France. He was born on 30 October 1858 and died on 3 July 1928. Epin competed at the 1920 Summer Olympics.Léon EpinLéon EPIN == References == Category:1858 births Category:1928 deaths Category:French archers Category:Olympians for France Category:People from Meurthe-et-Moselle Category:Sportspeople from Grand Est
title: Léon Epin
